channel.title: Abouts on FKF's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on FKF's blog

item.title: A quick overview of the tools I use in general
item.description: HOI So this is just a small list of things I use in my daily life…. I don't really use the computer to game much so IDK what to put in as my gaming software. I mainly write my code in the terminal with either neovim or helix (Shoutout silt) or Emacs for taking notes and such. In fact this site was made using Org mode! I have a pretty good Neovim config I am proud of.

item.title: FKF’s about info
item.description: Hoi I Am FKF. I'm a random 19 year old programmer. Uhh…..IDK what else to say…… I like music…..but I suppose most people do. Though my taste in music is a bit…odd to say the least. I do like to read though. Mainly fiction…. I also like to read Korean comic books AKA Manhwas. Though nowadays I don't really have the time to read because I am busy often.
